items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: A delicious burger made with a spicy vegetable patty, fresh lettuce, and tangy sauce.

items.name: Paneer Wrap
items.description: Soft wrap filled with marinated paneer, fresh veggies, and a zesty mayo dressing.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup.

items.description: Thin crust pizza topped with fresh vegetables and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Veggie Sandwich
items.description: Grilled sandwich with cucumber, tomato, and cheese, served with green chutney.

items.description: Crispy paneer cubes stir-fried with bell peppers in a spicy sauce.

items.description: Stir-fried noodles tossed with fresh veggies and Chinese sauces.

items.name: Veg Momos
items.description: Steamed dumplings stuffed with finely chopped vegetables, served with spicy chutney.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Fresh lettuce, cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese, dressed with olive oil.

items.name: Caesar Salad

items.name: Quinoa Salad

items.description: A simple and refreshing salad with cucumber, tomatoes, and a tangy dressing.

items.description: A creamy avocado salad with mixed greens and a light lemon dressing.

items.description: Boiled chickpeas tossed with fresh veggies and a hint of spice.

items.name: Beetroot Salad
items.description: Beetroot, carrots, and fresh greens dressed with balsamic vinaigrette.

items.name: Green Salad
